name: Me, myself and the space-time-continuum
description:
You are sitting in your space ship and the warp drive is working with full power. The future is doomed and can only be saved by collecting the time crystals in all six dimensions. 

But be aware... Traveling through time and space can be confusing for the space-time continuum. But you and your other selfs are always prepared to power up the time machine to savely travel back in time.
